feed.title: Evolutionary genomics of pathogens
feed.subtitle: The lab of Daniel Croll wants to understand how pathogens evolve to cause disease. For this, we mainly focus on major crop pathogens to unravel mechanisms of rapid adaptation. We want to understand how host resistance mechanisms are circumvented, pesticides become ineffective and how pathogens cope with climate challenges.
